name: playwright-test-suite-for-application-automation-286725
description: Playwright-based automated end-to-end test suite for the Kanban task manager application UI and workflows.

scripts.preinstall: PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npx playwright install --with-deps chromium || PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npx playwright install chromium || echo 'Preinstall: skipping with-deps or already installed; proceeding.'
scripts.pretest: node -e "console.log('[Playwright] Running tests in CI-friendly mode...')"
scripts.pw:install: PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npx playwright install --with-deps chromium || PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npx playwright install chromium
scripts.postinstall: PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npx playwright install --with-deps chromium || PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0 npx playwright install chromium || echo 'Postinstall: browsers already installed or install-deps not permitted; proceeding.'
